name: polkadot-apps
description: An Apps portal into the Polkadot network
author: Jaco Greeff <jacogr@gmail.com>

scripts.analyze: yarn clean && BUILD_ANALYZE=1 yarn run build:code && yarn source-map-explorer packages/apps/build/main.*.js
scripts.build: yarn run build:i18n && yarn run build:code
scripts.build:release:electron: yarn build && yarn build:electron && yarn postinstall:electron
scripts.build:release:www: yarn polkadot-ci-ghact-build && yarn build:release:ipfs && yarn build:release:ghpages
scripts.build:www: rm -rf packages/apps/build && mkdir -p packages/apps/build && yarn run build:i18n && cd packages/apps && NODE_ENV=production webpack --config webpack.config.js --mode production
scripts.build:electron: yarn clean:electronBuild && yarn build:electronMain && yarn build:electronRenderer
scripts.build:devElectronRenderer: cd packages/apps-electron && yarn webpack --config webpack.renderer.config.js --mode development
scripts.build:electronRenderer: cd packages/apps-electron && NODE_ENV=production yarn webpack --config webpack.renderer.config.js --mode production
scripts.build:devElectronMain: cd packages/apps-electron && yarn webpack --config webpack.main.config.js --mode development
scripts.build:electronMain: cd packages/apps-electron && NODE_ENV=production yarn webpack --config webpack.main.config.js --mode production
scripts.packElectron: yarn build:release:electron && yarn clean:electronRelease && electron-builder build -mwl
scripts.start: yarn clean && cd packages/apps && yarn webpack --config webpack.config.js --mode development --watch
scripts.start:electron: yarn clean:electronBuild && concurrently 'yarn build:devElectronMain && cd packages/apps-electron && electron ./build/electron.js' 'yarn build:devElectronRenderer'
